Thanks for using OfferUp! We regularly provide app updates to make local buying and selling even simpler. Here’s what's new:

- Now you can quickly access your OfferUp searches or item posts using Spotlight Search.

Thanks for using OfferUp! We regularly provide app updates to make local buying and selling even simpler. Here’s what’s new:
-        You can now take landscape photos on OfferUp.   
-        And for all those big-picture people out there, see an expanded image when you tap on a profile picture.

Thanks for using OfferUp! We regularly provide app updates to make local buying and selling even simpler. Here’s what’s new:
-        You can now take landscape photos on OfferUp.   
-        And for all those big-picture people out there, see an expanded image when you tap on a profile picture.

Thanks for using OfferUp! We've made updates to many of our existing features to make the app faster and more fun to use than ever before. Having trouble finding what you need locally? Shipping is now available nationwide! Update the app and start searching for treasure anywhere that OfferUp is supported!
